actor

Class Creature

  • java.lang.Object
    • city.cs.engine.Body
      • city.cs.engine.DynamicBody
        • city.cs.engine.Walker
          • actor.Creature
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnemyAssassin, Player

    public abstract class Creature
extends city.cs.engine.Walker
    Abstract Creature class for all living entities/actors (enemies, player, etc.) in the game.

    • Method Detail

      • getAnimation

        public abstract city.cs.engine.BodyImage getAnimation(java.lang.String animation)
        Returns the BodyImage representing one of the creature's animations depending on string keyword input. This method should be implemented within sub-classes individually depending on which animations they have.
        Parameters:
        animation - the conventional name of the animation the image for which will be returned.
        Returns:
        image of the requested animation.

      • getCurrentAnimation

        public city.cs.engine.BodyImage getCurrentAnimation()
        Returns:
        the animation the creature currently has attached.

      • isJumping

        public boolean isJumping()
        Returns:
        whether the creature is in the air.

      • isFlipped

        public boolean isFlipped()
        Returns:
        whether creature is facing negative X axis, i.e. if its active BodyImage is flipped. (Will only work correctly if creature has one and only one image attached).

      • getMoveSpeed

        public int getMoveSpeed()
        Returns:
        creature's movement speed.

      • getMaxHealth

        public int getMaxHealth()
        Returns:
        creature's maximum health.

      • getCurrentHealth

        public int getCurrentHealth()
        Returns:
        creature's current health.

      • getDamage

        public int getDamage()
        Returns:
        creature's damage.

      • resetToAnimation

        public void resetToAnimation(java.lang.String anim)
        Assigns new animation to the creature based on the direction it's currently facing; Removes all previous attached animations/images.
        Parameters:
        anim - animation to be assigned.

      • setMoveSpeed

        public void setMoveSpeed(int ms)
        Sets creature's movement speed.
        Parameters:
        ms - new movement speed.

      • setMaxHealth

        public void setMaxHealth(int mh)
